meanings.definition: Not as convenient or easy to use
meanings.sent1: Carrying the unhandier bag made her walk slower.
meanings.sent2: The old phone was unhandier than the new one.
meanings.sent3: Trying to eat soup with a fork was unhandier than expected.
meanings.sent4: His unhandier approach to fixing the leak only made it worse.
meanings.sent5: The unhandier path through the forest was overgrown and hard to navigate.

meanings.sent1: He felt unhandier than his friends at playing the piano.
meanings.sent2: The unhandier chef struggled to flip the pancakes.
meanings.sent3: Her unhandier attempts at juggling always ended in dropped balls.
meanings.sent4: The unhandier painter's brushstrokes were uneven and messy.
meanings.sent5: The unhandier player fumbled the ball during the crucial moment of the game.

meanings.sent1: Wearing the unhandier shoes, she tripped on the stairs.
meanings.sent2: The unhandier dancer stumbled during the performance.
meanings.sent3: His unhandier attempts at ice skating were comical to watch.
meanings.sent4: The unhandier juggler dropped the balls repeatedly.
meanings.sent5: The unhandier movements of the robot made it seem almost human.
